Label.Name: CONNECTIONFAILED
Label.LocalizedLabel: Unable to connect to the server
Verbindung zu Server kann nicht hergestellt werden.

Label.Name: FAILEDCONFIGDOWNLOAD
Label.LocalizedLabel: Unable to download the requested configuration from the server.\nCheck your connection to the server and try again.\nContact your system administrator if the problem persists.
Impossibile scaricare la configurazione richiesta dal server.\nVerificare la connessione al server e riprovare.\nContattare l'amministratore di sistema se il problema persiste.
de_Unable to download the requested configuration from the server.\nCheck your connection to the server and try again.\nContact your system administrator if the problem persists.
配置文件下载失败。\n原因如下：无法连接到服务器或者配置模板加载失败。\n请您与管理员联系。
